description:
Hitori Bocchi suffers from extreme social anxiety, she’s not good at talking to people, takes pretty extreme actions, is surprisingly adept at avoiding people, her legs cramp when she overexerts herself, gets full of herself when alone, will vomit when exposed to extreme tension and often comes up with plans. Now she is entering middle school and her only friend, Yawara Kai, is attending a different school. This leaves Bocchi alone, surrounded by new classmates with whom she must make friends before Kai will talk to her again.

(Source: Doki)

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

node.description:
**Residency:** Tokyo, Japan

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/anzai_takebumi)**

Takefumi Anzai is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.

__Special skills and hobbies:__ Basketball, visiting cafes
__Agent:__ Aptepro

[Aptepro Profile](http://aptepro.jp/talents/c_morishita.html)

Chisaki Morishita is a Japanese voice actress who is affiliated with Aptepro. She made her voice acting debut in 2016, and in 2019 played her first named and first main role as [Bocchi Hitori](https://anilist.co/character/128986/), the protagonist of the anime television series [Hitori Bocchi no Marumaru Seikatsu](https://anilist.co/anime/101386/).

Morishita initially aspired to become a novelist, but eventually decided to pursue a career in voice acting instead due to her interest in anime. After passing an audition with the talent agency Aptepro, she began training as a voice actress while also pursuing university studies; she became affiliated with the company in 2016. She then played background roles in anime television series such as [Harukana Receive](https://anilist.co/anime/99586/) and [Mitsuboshi Colors](https://anilist.co/anime/98439/).

[Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%9F%E8%A1%8C&cell029=%E5%A5%B3%E6%80%A7&keyword=&cell028=&cell004=&name=%E7%94%B0%E4%B8%AD%E3%80%80%E7%BE%8E%E6%B5%B7&id=242&label=1) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/minazou_373) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/minazou_in_sta/)

Announced her marriage on November 22, 2023.

**Non-anime roles:**
- [Alice](https://anilist.co/character/292758/Tendou-Alice) - Blue Archive (Video Game)
- Linaria - Granblue Fantasy (Video Game)
- Urakaze, Wakaba - Azur Lane (Video Game)
- Rover (Female) - Wuthering Waves (Video Game)

__Height:__ 153 cm
__Agency:__ Racoon Dog

[Profile (Racoon Dog)](https://www.raccoon-dog.co.jp/talent/r09-kitou.html
) | [Official Site](https://kitoakari.com/) | [Twitter (Official)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [Twitter (Personal)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_1016/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU_E2DHcyQu-Toohyd1vzRw)

A Japanese voice actress. She debuted in 2014, got her first main role in *Time Bokan 24* (2016), and has since received more leading roles. On October 16, 2019, her 25th birthday, she made her debut as a solo music artist under Pony Canyon. After the agency Pro-Fit shut down their operations, she joined the new agency Racoon Dog on 2022. 

**Non anime roles:**
- [Abukuma](https://anilist.co/character/228251/Abukuma), Hass, Isuzu, and Nagara - Azur Lane (VG)
- [Barbara](https://anilist.co/character/203315/Barbara-Pegg) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Silence](https://anilist.co/character/186429/Silence) - Arknights (VG)
- Rola - Shadowverse (VG)
- Sabrina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Ashley Graham - Resident Evil 4 Remake (VG)
- Pepper - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Celine](https://anilist.co/character/305904 ) - Fire Emblem Engage (VG)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/池田祐二) | [Studio Wyeth](https://www.studio-wyeth.jp/)

A prominent art director, as well as the founder and representative director of Studio Wyeth.

_Note: Not to be confused with animator [Yuuji Ikeda](https://anilist.co/staff/144426/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/HdkzTanaka)

__Birthplace:__ Osaka Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Kobe University (Faculty of Developmental Sciences, Department of Human Representation)

__Hidekazu Tanaka__ is a Japanese composer and arranger.

He left MONACA on July 31, 2021, and went independent. 

On October 24, 2022, he was arrested on suspicion of sexual assault of a teenage girl in Meguro, Tokyo in August of that year. On March 15, 2023, Tanaka admitted to obscenity charges which included saying obscene language to a 15-year-old girl, along with admitting to voyeurism at least dozens of times in the past 10 years.

__[Profile (MONACA)](http://www.monaca.jp/staff/takada.html)__

__Ryuuichi Takada__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and member of music unit MONACA. He mainly composes and arranges for videogames, having worked on the soundtracks for Soul Calibur, Tekken, Katamari Damacy, and The iDOLM@STER.

[Website](https://monaca.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MONACA_jp)

__MONACA__ is a Japanese music production studio, which was established by the composer Keiichi Okabe in October 2004.

__Members__:
• [Keiichi Okabe](https://anilist.co/staff/121585/Keiichi-Okabe) (CEO)
• [Satoru Kousaki](https://anilist.co/staff/101555/Satoru-Kousaki)
• [Ryuuichi Takada](https://anilist.co/staff/109459/Ryuuichi-Takada)
• [Kakeru Ishihama](https://anilist.co/staff/150946/Kakeru-Ishihama)
• [Hidekazu Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/141852/Hidekazu-Tanaka)
• [Keiichi Hirokawa](https://anilist.co/staff/156490/Keiichi-Hirokawa)
• [Kuniyuki Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/154774/Kuniyuki-Takahashi)
• [Shuotarou Seo](https://anilist.co/staff/317330/Shoutarou-Seo)
• [Oliver Good](https://anilist.co/staff/317296)
• [Keita Inoue](https://anilist.co/staff/229376/Keita-Inoue)

__Past Members__:
• [Yuri Mitsumi](https://anilist.co/staff/201236/Yuri-Misumi)
• [Keigo Hoashi](https://anilist.co/staff/111233/Keigo-Hoashi)
